fulltext:
Pham Ngoc Dai
IOS DEVELOPER
Objective
- I hope to be excepted for the Junior Application Developer of your company. In the dynamic
enviroment and alsoinclude challenges, with my experiences is trained in the college besides
communication skill and the passion in my heart. I am confident I will help your company will
develop more and more.
� Education
THU DUC COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY
OCTOBER 2015 -
OCTOBER 2015
Major: SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
Specialize:
- Application development.
- Game development.
Project:
- Clinic managerment application.
- Japanese quiz-test application
- Real estate application
- Sell mobile products application(Simulator)
SKILLS
English
Computer office
Workteam
Presentation
Commutication
�Work Experience
REACT NATIVE PROGRAMMING
JULY 2017 - SEPTEMBER
2017
DEVELOP JAPANESE QUIZ-TEST APPLICATION
Type: Team project.
Position: Developer.
Main responsible:
- Learning react native programming.
- Design layout on android/iOS mobile .
- Use api connect webservice to get json fill data in application.
- Handling bug process development.
- Use github to push/pull daily jobs.
- Use redmine to report daily job.
- Write code with MVC models.
Achievements and skills gained:
- Can design layout on android/iOS.
- Can get json from webservice.
- Can use tool to manage project: redmine, github.
SWIFT PROGRAMMING
OCTOBER 2017 -
DECEMBER 2017
DEVELOP SELL MOBILE PRODUCT APPLICATION
Type: Team project.
Position: Team leader.
Main responsible:
- Research the topic.
- Learning swift.
- Design layout on iOS mobile.
- Design database for application.
- Connect application with database.
INTERESTS
Soccer
Music
Food
Game
Travel
- Process all of function: login, logout, find product, check login to buy product, order.
Achievements and skills gained:
- Design on iOS mobile by swift.
- Learning concepts of swift.
- Can design database use sqlite.
- Can use sqlite to connect with application.
IOS SWIFT PROGRAMING
OCTOBER 2018 - MARCH
2019
FPT Camera
Type: Team project.
Position: iOS Swift developer.
Main responsible:
- Design UI/UX with percentage size of device.
- Restful API with Alamofire.
- Push Notification with APNs.
- Research VIP Model.
- Implement features.
- Apply UI App from designer.
- Apply Webview into App.
- Reuse component for multi screen.
Achievements and skills gained:
- More experinence about design UI.
- Understand Autolayout from swift.
- Understand API.
- Understand Webservice.
- Can design UI with percentage size of device.
- Can use Jira, GitLab.
- Can write code with VIP Model.
- Can apply Webview into App.
- Custom component to use multi screen.
� Activities
REACT NATIVE INTERNSHIP
JULY 2017 - DECEMBER
2017
internship in softworld company
- Learned react native programming.
- Learned the way to operate application online.
- Learned corporate enviroment.
- Learned use tool to manage project: github, redmine. 
- Apply MVC model in project
SWIFT PROGRAMING FRESHER
OCTOBER 2018 - MARCH
2018
Fresher work in FPT
- Learned how to use gitLab, Jira.
- Learned how to write code with VIP models.
- Learned how to push notification with APNs.
- Learned custom component in swift.
- Learned how to design with autolayout.
- Learned how to design with percentage of size screen.

Top 5 C++ programer of gameloft with the quiz test of company.
2018
Very good rank of diploma.

2018
�Additional Information
- I have ability to work invidually also teamwork.
- Passion and Ethusiastic is also my advantage.
- I hope to learn more and more.
- I hope to improve my self in the professional enviroment.
- I would like to work with dynamic coleagues.
